html:
3.8.22  9:37 pm   What's your favorite genre?

      favoritism. wait........ no, i got it backwards. i don't really like that one

3.8.22  8:35 pm   I find it very hard to write verses for songs, but everything else comes so easily. Sometimes I have too much to say, sometimes too little, or maybe I'm just not thinking hard enough. What helps you balance that? 

      the problem is usually thinking too hard. songwriting is obnoxiously shy if it thinks you are thinking at all. the songwriting will never appear if it thinks you're thinking about it. i don't know of a way around this. because i don't know how to actually stop thinking. all i can do is be patient and eventually i'll forget to think. then the answers flood in. then i get so excited i think about how exciting it is. then i'm fucked. and so the cycle continues

3.8.22  8:25 pm   was 0:54 of the new video a sincere request for people to like and subscribe, or a parody?

      surely a mad scramble to find something that works there

3.8.22  8:10 pm   do you use storyboards for your videos?

      for a song video, it seems like the answer is no, until i realize that i wrote and recorded the entire song's audio before touching the video. so that behaves like an extremely strict storyboard

3.8.22  8:09 pm   What is the square root of 7?

      got to be between 2 and 3

3.8.22  8:08 pm   In the airport terminal, did you actually heT PORRIDGE FOR THE WRONG AMOUNT OF TIME?

      no, what i did was i embarked into writing a bridge section which i thought took some interesting turns but instead it got me backed into a corner i didn't want to go to and couldn't get out of. so i removed that part, went back to the point before it did that, and then used one of my standard tricks which is: express how i feel about how the writing process is going, in the writing

3.8.22  8:07 pm   How do I get character A to fall in love with character B without making it too forced?

      just put them near each other, and try to make sure they don't fall in love. make it impossible for them to fall in love. love loves this

3.8.22  8:01 pm   thoughts on consonant mutation?

      dank

3.8.22  7:56 pm   In which cases is it good to say true things in a confusing way?

      in most forms of art or entertainment, i could imagine that would be cool sometimes

3.8.22  7:33 pm   how often is the "i" in fly around you and how often it is me? is it them sometimes?

      it's you as many times as you need it

3.8.22  7:15 pm   Within a chapter of importance, such that it were to be in fact credible, perhaps it could be inquired for; there is an absolute interest to be determined - If such, determined it shan't be on the conundrum of overall importance. Do you agree?

      that feels like it's missing all the context

3.8.22  6:30 pm   please give me good advice that pertains to the moment at hand

      which moment is it

3.8.22  6:29 pm   is there any particular reason why you chose to wear sunglasses in fly around?

      i really wished i had them in "i'm scared" but i couldn't find any. so i got extras for this time to make up for it

3.8.22  6:10 pm   hi bill, where can i get those special sandals?

      you have them. it's anything you have

3.8.22  5:48 pm   Hi Bill, loved the new song.  Also, have you ever recorded a song in d flat?

     absolutely

     If so can I hear it please?

     sure

3.8.22  5:43 pm   Why is your latest song not about boats?

      didn't come up

3.8.22  5:26 pm   what is the meaning of music

      music is a meaning enhancer

3.8.22  5:22 pm   when did you start writing "fly around"?

      august 6, 2020

3.8.22  5:20 pm   How do I help the world become a better place?

      just by being there

3.8.22  5:09 pm   First, just wanna say I LOVE fly around! Your music is such a jam to listen to. You're so creative and talented!

     holy smokes you are friendly and filled with kindness

     Ok, my questions is: Does the top hat in the i'm scared video symbolize anything?

     yes! a mad scramble to find something that works there

     It appears multiple times in different settings,

     i only recall 1 time, but if it's multiple times then that's always a good trick: use something already familiar within the video

     so does it relate to any part of the song's meaning?

      no. but, it does relate to performing. which is what the video is tasked to do for this song material

3.8.22  5:04 pm   it seems like you really mastered how to make videos in 3d with i'm scared and fly around, do you feel the same way?

      no

3.8.22  4:43 pm   i don't know anything but would like to make an original song. how?

      the bad news is, no one knows. the good news is, you might know

3.8.22  4:39 pm   so a guy walks into a bar

      i believe this

3.8.22  4:38 pm   do you know how to play banjo?

     i know it's strung in 5ths. so i have that going for me

      In that case what other instruments do you play?

     street sign. the way you do this is you tap each street sign you walk by. prepare to be dazzled. the sign does most of the work here

3.8.22  4:34 pm   when was the last time you touched grass

      must have been september 5, 2019

3.8.22  4:30 pm   I really believe in freedom, but I also don't like to go out much. is that a dichotomy or a paradox or something?

      i doubt it

3.8.22  4:30 pm   what is your opinion on music

      imagine if heaven and hell had an open line of communication going on between them

3.8.22  4:23 pm   Are your days of 7-second sketches over

      i'm now living in the golden age of sketches. and by that i mean most of my sketches go on for like 14 minutes at least, and don't seem to end. this may seem like a problem for production, but it never actually reaches production if the writing just keeps going

3.8.22  4:21 pm   where did you buy your special sandals

      i don't have special sandals

3.8.22  4:21 pm   Nice new song, but... you kept ending the end with "the". What is the square actually called?

      the dirty secret here is that the song was made before the video was made. and i don't think there was any square involved there. i think the square shown on screen is called a........ box that i drew (twice)

3.8.22  4:21 pm   why is the did you post the new song so quickly???

      here's how i did it: my shocking ineptitude over the years has distorted your perception of time in my favor, and you now believe 3 weeks is actually a short time

3.8.22  3:14 pm   how to focus on the next project asap

      think of it as a rain drop, but then don't think about it. think about the entire rain, not the drops

3.8.22  2:42 pm   what do you consult when you feel completely stuck and have no clue on how to move forwards?

      maybe you

3.8.22  2:28 pm   favorite material

      stuff

3.8.22  2:07 pm   what is your favorite motif ?

      i'm wondering if there's some kind of heavy motif

3.8.22  11:11 am   How are music and math related?

      music is related to everything, and math is related to everything. so therefore music and math are related via everything

3.8.22  8:36 am   when was the last time you used a capital letter?

      about 14 questions ago

3.8.22  5:11 am   do you always read and follow the label?

      that's impossible, if you read both sides. usually a parodox in there

3.7.22  11:47 pm   do you plan on making videos with neon text again like your older videos or are you planning on sticking with your newer 3d style 

      the problem here is that i don't know what "neon text" is. i know of neon the element, and i think it was maybe a car brand at some point. besides that i don't know what neon means but it is a nice word and i would like to use that word for sure

3.7.22  10:49 pm   in long long long journey, was the stick figure riding on a pod of dolphins because you were going on a PODcast?

      there's no way i was aware of that

3.7.22  10:49 pm   trombone or trumpet

      dare i envoke the trombpet

3.7.22  10:16 pm   what is the context of the song "new canaan"?

      i found a cool trick to have a great day and feel good about life. get a 3-ring binder full of music paper and get on a train to a town you've never been to and write a song along the way. that's not the first time i've done this, nor the last

3.7.22  9:16 pm   whats your opinion on soup?

      mild

3.7.22  8:09 pm   if PERSON A betrays PERSON B, who is dumber?

      they both have the exact same intelligence

3.7.22  7:51 pm   do all aliens speak in British accents?

      no

3.7.22  7:29 pm   do you think shadows are a pyramid scheme?

      no

3.7.22  5:14 pm   What makes cars go?

      torque?

3.7.22  5:13 pm   Why is everything so confusing?

      because it's true

3.7.22  2:44 pm   what's your favorite font

      making a total mess

3.7.22  2:01 pm   have you considered a podcast, or making one of those letters that companies send out to people when their subscriptions are ending?

      yes
